com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.widget.tooltip

Class DynamicTooltip

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.widget.tooltip.DynamicTooltip
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    View.OnAttachStateChangeListener, View.OnHoverListener, View.OnLongClickListener

    public class DynamicTooltip
extends Object
implements View.OnLongClickListener, View.OnHoverListener, View.OnAttachStateChangeListener
    Event handler used to emulate the behavior of View.setTooltipText(CharSequence) with icon and custom colors.

        Set the tooltip for the view.
        Parameters:
        view - The view to set the tooltip on.
        backgroundColor - The background color for the tooltip.
        tintColor - The tint color for the tooltip.
        icon - The icon drawable for the tooltip.
        text - The text for the tooltip.
